mapper.select: SELECT resource.id, resource.resource_name, resource.url, resource.permission, resource.modular_name, resource.request_method, resource.parent_id, resource.anonymous, resource.modular, resource.create_time FROM tb_user_auth user LEFT JOIN tb_role role ON JSON_CONTAINS(user.role_ids, JSON_ARRAY(role.id)) LEFT JOIN tb_resource resource ON JSON_CONTAINS(role.resource_ids, JSON_ARRAY(resource.id)) WHERE user.id = ${userId} AND user.disable != 1 AND role.disable != 1 AND resource.modular != 1
